tabs.commandInContext:
//This KQL-queryset creates a calculated column
MyImportData 
| where MyEventType == "IncomingRequest"
| extend MyNumberofDaysSinceEvent = datetime_diff('day', now(), MyTimestamp)
tabs.commandWithoutLeadingComments:
//This KQL-queryset creates a calculated column
MyImportData 
| where MyEventType == "IncomingRequest"
| extend MyNumberofDaysSinceEvent = datetime_diff('day', now(), MyTimestamp)
